dct_title_s: Carte des variations de la boussole et des vents généraux que l'on trouve dans les mers les plus frequentées
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Covers predominantly the Atlantic and Indian Oceans and adjacent coastlines. In upper margin: No. 5. Appears in Bellin's Hydrographie françoise and Atlas maritime. Prime meridian: Paris. Includes "Remarques" and decorative cartouche.
dct_publisher_sm: [Paris? : Dépost des cartes de la marine?, 1765]
